title: Kagoshima
description: Kagoshima, in southern Japan, is known for its stunning views of Sakurajima, an active volcano that dominates the skyline. But it also has amazing food!

images.title: Tenmonkan Dori
images.description: One of the iconic images of Kagoshima City is the Tenmonkan Dori road, with its covered shopping areas and wonderful trams.

images.title: Sakurajima Overlooking the City
images.description: You can't have Kagoshima without Sakurajima, one of the world's most active (and inhabited) volcanoes.

images.alt: Senganen, the garden made by Shimazu family
images.title: Senganen, the garden made by Shimazu family
images.description: This may be one of the most tranquil views of an active volcano you'll ever see.
